snippet.title: The Signifier Announcement Trailer - A Surreal Mystery Game Coming to PC October 15th
snippet.description:
Wishlist The Signifier on Steam: https://bit.ly/2xQ4Avq
The Signifier is a story-driven tech-noir mystery adventure. Explore the real world and enter the unconscious realms of the mind for clues to solve puzzles, unravel layers of dialog, find the truth. 
Find out more: https://www.thesignifier.com

Follow us:
http://twitter.com/SignifierGame
https://twitter.com/rawfury
https://discord.gg/rawfury
https://www.facebook.com/The-Signifier-108490934116327/
